LONG_NAME: sea surface wave spectral significant height

COMMENT: Analysed by spectral method. Period of the peak of the energy spectrum
Analysed by spectral method. The first wave period is calculated as m0/m1 where m0 and m1 are the zeroth order and first order moments of the wave spectrum
